Dark One/Nemesis Enforcer/Serpentor:



"Nemesis Enforcer, transform!" Nemesis cried out.  Raising his rifle, he 
fired twenty rapid blasts.  7 of the shots sent Anubis hitting the ground, 5 
sendng Hades spinning, and 8 shots sending Unitron smashing to the ground.

---

Serpentor saw three Newcomers fall.  Looking up, he saw Nemesis Enforcer.  

"You!" Nemesis cried out, putting his rifle into subspace.

Serpentor raised his arms to motion the others to stay back.  "I will meet 
this intruder, head on!" he yelled, Nemesis diving down at him, Serpentor 
leaping in the air, both of them having an arm pulled back getting ready for 
a punch.

--- 

Dark One saw the Ark under heavy attack.  "Holy slag."  <All Oblitercons, 
fall in on my position.  Attack, and destroy the enemy forces.  Beat up the 
Maximals if it comes to that> he chuckled, bringing up his targeting 
computer.  Firing one missile at Ominous Prime, one missile at Ra, and twenty 
rapid lasers at Shuko, the rapid lasers sending Shuko down to the ground more 
from surprise then the strength of the lasers.
